trans-unit.source: Enables <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: Umożliwia <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrolek ani innych kontrolek serwera zawierać kolekcji zleceń.

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Zlecenie w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>formantów jest akcją, którą użytkownik może wykonywać w interfejsie użytkownika (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj zlecenie jest reprezentowana w interfejsie użytkownika przez aktywne kontroli, takie jak przycisk, łącze lub elementu menu.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Zestaw kontroli części sieci Web udostępnia zleceń standardowych, które są dostępne, aby domyślnie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrolek i innych kontrolek serwera (takich jak niestandardowe, ASP.NET, a użytkownik kontroluje) który mogą pełnić rolę <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>formanty umieszczone w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>strefy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: Zleceń standardowych obejmują Zamknij, zminimalizować przywracanie, usuwanie, edytowanie i wyeksportować.

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: Można również utworzyć niestandardowe zleceń do użycia z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i kontrolki serwera.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebActionable interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: Interfejs IWebActionable z jego <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>Właściwości, pozwala na integrowanie niestandardowych zleceń formantów.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the IWebActionable interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Klasa implementuje interfejs IWebActionable i implementuje jedną właściwość.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aby dodać niestandardowe zleceń do formantu, który dziedziczy z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klasy, należy zastąpić <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Właściwości, można dodać do kolekcji niestandardowych zleceń i zwracać kolekcję.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja odwołuje się <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>właściwość zawiera tylko niestandardowych zlecenia; zleceń standardowych nie znajdują się w tej kolekcji.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Domyślna wartość zwracana <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Właściwości w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>formant jest `null`, ponieważ domyślnie nie zawiera żadnych niestandardowych zleceń kolekcji.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: Dodawanie poleceń niestandardowych do kontrolki serwera, które nie są <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrolki wymaga jednego dodatkowego kroku.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the IWebActionable interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: W takich przypadkach kontrolki musi także implementować interfejs IWebActionable i implementować <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: Po dodaniu niestandardowych zlecenia, które mają <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>kolekcji, automatycznie ustawia formantu części sieci Web obsługuje pozostałe kroki niezbędne do tworzenia i renderowania niestandardowych zleceń.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera odwołanie do kolekcji niestandardowych <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość zleceń odwołuje się do kolekcji niestandardowych poleceń (jeśli istnieją) dodanych do menu zleceń w nagłówku <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>lub inny formant serwera.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja zleceń nie zawiera odwołania do standardowego <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>ustawić obiekty dostarczane z formantem części sieci Web, takich jak <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, lub <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: Deweloperzy, którzy mają zostać dodane niestandardowe zlecenia, które mają niestandardowy kontrolować, która jest pochodną <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klasy można po prostu zastąpić <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>Właściwości który <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Klasa implementuje.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the Verbs property.
trans-unit.target: Deweloperzy, którzy mają zostać dodane niestandardowe zleceń do kontrolki użytkownika lub kontrolki niestandardowej, która nie jest <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrolować, musi implementować <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>interfejsu, dostarczając implementację właściwości zleceń.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> zawiera niestandardowe <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> obiektów.
